seo.title: Contact | SustainSage
seo.description: Start a calm coaching enquiry with SustainSage. Share your context and we’ll respond with intro call options, clear boundaries and next steps.

hero.title: Begin with a grounded check-in
hero.subtitle: Tell us where you are right now. We will decide together whether coaching is useful.

intro.title: What to share
intro.description: A few bullet points are enough—we just need a sense of your context.
bullets: The transition or decision that feels most alive.
Any time pressures, access needs or boundaries we should know.
Your preferred language and time zone for the intro call.

process.title: What happens after you reach out
process.description: We keep the process light, transparent and pressure-free.
bullets: Reply within two to three UK working days with intro call options.
20-minute intro call to clarify focus, fit and safeguarding boundaries.
You choose whether to begin a package—no scripts, no upsell.

assurance.title: How we hold the space
assurance.description: You can switch languages mid-message or mid-session—your pace matters.
bullets: Coaching available in English, Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese.
Online by default; in-person in the UK when schedules align.
We store information only to arrange coaching unless law requires otherwise.

faq.title: Questions before you book
faq.intro: Here are a few quick answers. The full FAQ covers ethics, process and safety in more depth.

form.title: Send us a note
form.subtitle: Share enough context so we can respond with care. Bullet points welcome.
form.name: Name
form.help: What transition or decision is on your mind?
form.helpHint: Examples: moving to the UK, returning after parental leave, cross-cultural leadership, burnout risk.
form.focusHint: Choose the option that feels closest; it is fine to stay uncertain.
form.timezonePlaceholder: e.g. UK mornings, GMT+8 evenings, or flexible
form.consent: I consent to SustainSage contacting me about coaching.
form.scopeAcknowledgement: I understand this form is for coaching enquiries, not therapy, crisis support, legal or immigration advice.
form.privacyNote: We store your information only to arrange coaching conversations and delete it if we do not work together, unless law requires otherwise.

status.success: Thank you. We’ll reply within three UK working days.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email contact@sustainsage.com.
status.errorRequired: Please complete the required fields and confirm consent.

lines: Typical reply time: within three UK working days.
We can coach in English, 繁體中文, 简体中文 — feel free to write in any mix.
Read more about confidentiality and data care in {privacyLink}.
